definition.text: This data mine processes data fetched from the Messsari API Map.

paragraphs.text: Bot Products
Asset Metrics
Saves raw API data into Superalgos compatible Multi-Time-Frame-Daily and Multi-Time-Frame-Market files.
The News, All-Time-High, Market Data, Supply, and Blockchain Stats indicator bots process this raw data into organized datasets listed below.
News
Collects fetched news stories into a Single-File data type format.
Processed Values:
Timestamp: Date of news article.
Record Id: Id of stored article.
Author: Author of article.
Title: Title of article.
Content: Content of article.
All-Time-High
Saves all time high data for the all time high indicator.
Processed Values:
Date At: date of All Time High.
Percent Down: current percentage down from All Time High.
Days Since: days since All Time High.
Rate: price of All Time High.
Begin: beginning of time frame watched.
End: end of time frame watched.
Market Data
Saves a variety of market data for the current asset.
Processed Values:
Percent Change BTC Last 24 Hs: Percentage change in BTC last 24 hours.
Percent Change USD Last 24 Hs: Percentage change in USD last 24 hours.
Real Volume Last 24 Hs: Filtered volume for the last 24 hours.
Volume Last 24 Hs: Unfiltered volume for the last 24 hours.
Price BTC: market price in BTC.
Price USD: market price in USD.
Begin: beginning of time frame watched.
End: end of time frame watched.
Supply
Saves a variety of supply data for the current asset.
Processed Values:

Stock to Flow: Stock to Flow is calculated by taking the Liquid Supply today and dividing by the projected 12month increase in Liquid Supply. This is essentially the inverse of Current Inflation. The value is null for assets with fixed or decreasing Liquid Supply.
Circulating: Circulating Supply refers to tokens that exist on-chain, and which are not known to be encumbered by any contracts (programmatic or legal).
Liquid: Liquid Supply refers to tokens that exist on-chain, and which are not known to be encumbered by any contracts (programmatic or legal).
Plus 10 Issued Percent: The percent of the Year+10 supply that's currently liquid on the market today.
Y Plus 10: The expected supply 10 years from now.
Y 2050 Percent Issued: The percentage of the Y2050 supply which has already been issued.
Y 2050: The expected supply on Jan 1 2050.
Begin: beginning of time frame watched.
End: end of time frame watched.
Blockchain Stats
Saves a variety of blockchain statistics data for the current asset.
Processed Values:
Supply Moved Off Chain: Amount of supply moved off chain for the last 24 hours.
Count of Block Added: Count of block added for the last 24 hours.
Kilobytes Added: Amount of killobytes added to the chain for the last 24 hours.
Average Difficulty: Average difficulty of mined blocks for the last 24 hours.
New Issuance: Amount of new issued coins for the last 24 hours.
Count of Payments: Count of payments for the last 24 hours.
Count of Tx: Transaction count for the last 24 hours.
Count of Active Addresses: Active addresses for the last 24 hours.
Median Tx Fee: Median transaction fee for the last 24 hours.
Median Tx Value: Median transaction value for the last 24 hours.
Sum of Fees: Total of fees for the last 24 hours.
NVT: NVT is computed by dividing the Network Value (= Market Value) by the total transactions volume in USD over the past 24 hours.
Transaction Volume: Transaction volume for the last 24 hours.
Begin: beginning of time frame watched.
End: end of time frame watched.
Indicators
All Time High - Messari API Indicator
